title: Register Map
description: Generated from 02-dictionary/artifacts/register_map_ENRICHED.md. Pins locale-specific voice, register, punctuation, idioms, and accessibility guidance for translators and adjacent roles.

title.description: Locale code headline (e.g., NL, EN-GB, DE).

edited.description: Date this register map was last edited.

owner.description: Role maintaining the map; fixed to Translator.

scope.description: Book or slice name this register map supports.

snapshot.description: Cold snapshot reference in format "Cold @ YYYY-MM-DD".

tu.description: Reference TU ID in format TU-YYYY-MM-DD-<role><seq>.

neighbors.description: Roles paired on this register guidance; must include style, binder, PN, gatekeeper.

locale.description: ISO locale code for this register map.

voice_and_address.description: Pronouns, formality, titles, and directness guidance.

formality_switch_rules.description: Optional rules describing when to switch formality levels.

titles_honorifics.description: Optional localized titles and honorific conventions.

directness_level.description: Guidance on sentence directness and clause length near choices.

tense_aspect_mood.description: Narrative tense/aspect/mood policy including progressive, imperatives, and modals.

narrative_tense.description: Primary narrative tense selection (e.g., present simple).

pn_patterns.description: Localized PN patterns with player-safe examples.

punctuation_numerals.description: Rules for quotation, decimals, dashes, time/date, and choice markers.

orthography_typography.description: Casing, diacritics, hyphenation, and directionality guidance.

idiom_lexicon_policy.description: Banned idioms, preferred turns, loanword policy, and localization stance.

accessibility_readability.description: Accessibility guidance covering sentence length, numbers, names, and alt/caption register.

quality_bar.description: One of 8 Quality Bars (see taxonomies.md ยง5)

loop_name.description: One of 13 TU loop types (see taxonomies.md ยง3 and loop_names.md)

deferral_tag.description: Deferral type for dormant roles (see taxonomies.md ยง7)
